TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientRuntime extends System.Object
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientRuntime extends System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientRuntimeCompatBase
Public NotInheritable Class ClientRuntime Inherits ClientRuntimeCompatBase

summary.span: 表示类的插入点，这些类可以扩展客户端应用程序处理的所有消息的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 客户端对象的功能。

span.span: Represents the insertion point for classes that extend the functionality of Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) client objects for all messages handled by a client application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WINDOWS COMMUNICATION FOUNDATION (wcf) 客户端应用程序将方法调用转换为出站消息，并将传入消息转换为客户端方法的结果，则 wcf 客户端对象（无论是否为或的扩展）都使用 wcf 客户端对象。WCF client objects, whether an extension of or of , are used by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) client applications to convert method calls into outbound messages and convert incoming messages to objects and pass them to the results of client methods. 类是一个扩展点，您可以将截获消息并在所有操作中扩展客户端行为的扩展对象添加到该扩展点。The class is an extensibility point to which you can add extension objects that intercept messages and extend client behavior across all operations. 截获对象可以在特定的约定中处理所有消息，仅处理特定操作的消息，执行自定义通道初始化，以及实现其他自定义客户端应用程序行为。Interception objects can process all messages in a particular contract, process only messages for particular operations, perform custom channel initialization, and implement other custom client application behavior. 有关客户端体系结构的概述，请参阅 [WCF 客户端体系结构](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-architecture)。For an overview of client architecture, see [WCF Client Architecture](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/client-architecture). 有关客户端编程的详细信息，请参阅 [使用 WCF 客户端访问服务](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client)。For more information about client programming, see [Accessing Services Using a WCF Client](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/accessing-services-using-a-client). 有关自定义以及如何执行自定义的详细信息，请参阅 [扩展客户端](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extending-clients)。For details about customizations and how to perform them, see [Extending Clients](/dotnet/framework/wcf/extending/extending-clients). - 属性返回服务启动的回调操作的调度运行时对象。The property returns the dispatch run-time object for service-initiated callback operations. - 属性接受使用自定义操作选择器对象来控制客户端消息的路由。The property accepts a custom operation selector object to control the routing of client messages. - 使用 属性可以添加检查或修改客户端通道的通道初始值设定项。The property enables the addition of a channel initializer that can inspect or modify the client channel. - 属性可用于显示可视化提示，使用户可以在打开通道前选择凭据。The property can be used to display a visual prompt to enable a user to select credentials prior to opening the channel. - 属性获取 对象的集合，您可以将提供特定于该操作的消息的功能的自定义消息拦截器添加到该集合。The property gets a collection of objects to which you can add custom message interceptors that provide functionality specific to the messages of that operation. - 使用 属性，应用程序可以关闭某些自动寻址标头来直接控制寻址。The property enables an application to turn off some automatic addressing headers to directly control addressing. - 使用 属性，客户端可以限制客户端接受的错误消息的大小。The property enables the client to limit the size of fault messages that the client accepts. - 属性获取 对象的集合，您可以将通过客户端的所有消息的自定义消息拦截器添加到这些对象。The property gets a collection of objects to which you can add custom message interceptors for all messages traveling through a client. - 属性返回意外消息被传递到的操作。The property returns the operation to which unexpected messages are passed. - 属性通知系统它是否应确认标记为 `MustUnderstand` 的 SOAP 标头是否确实已被理解。The property informs the system whether it should confirm that SOAP headers marked as `MustUnderstand` have, in fact, been understood. - 属性设置传输级别的消息的目标的值，来支持中介以及其他方案。The property sets the value of the destination of the message at the transport level to support intermediaries and other scenarios. 另外，还有其他多个属性可以检索客户端协定信息：In addition, there are a number of other properties that retrieve the client contract information: - - - 如果客户端是双工客户端，以下属性还可以检索客户端回调类型以及运行时：If the client is a duplex client, the following properties also retrieve the client callback type and runtime: - - ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中， 通过将 添加到 属性，从而将它插入到客户端运行时中。In the following code example an inserts a into the client runtime by adding it to the property. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例演示将终结点行为加载到客户端终结点的配置文件。The following code example shows a configuration file that loads the endpoint behavior into the client endpoint. [!code-xml[Interceptors#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/client.exe.config#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来添加自定义 对象，该对象可以检查创建时与客户端关联的通道，在通道上注册事件，以及使用 将状态与该通道相关联。Use the property to add a custom object that can inspect the channel that is associated with a client on creation, register for events on the channel, and associate state with the channel by using .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示客户端是否将寻址标头添加到请求-回复消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client adds addressing headers to request-reply messages.

value.span: 如果客户端不添加任何寻址标头，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the client does not add any addressing headers; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要防止客户端将“消息 ID”和“答复”寻址标头添加到请求/响应消息，请将 属性设置为 `true`，以便您的应用程序可以控制这些标头。Set the property to `true` if you want to prevent the client from adding Message ID and Reply-To addressing headers to request/response messages so that your application can control these headers. > [!NOTE] > 如果 为 `true`，则客户端不支持双工通道上的请求-回复操作。If is `true`, the client does not support request-reply operations over a duplex channel.

summary.span: 获取客户端的客户端操作的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of client operations for a client.

value.span: 对象的同步集合。

span.span: A synchronized collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以获取此客户端的、可用于附加扩展对象的所有操作的集合，而这些扩展对象可以检查或修改局限于特定操作的消息和行为。Use the property to get a collection of all client operations for this client that you can use to attach extension objects that inspect or modify messages and behavior scoped to a particular operation. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see . ## Examples 在下面的代码示例中， 通过将 添加到 属性中的每个 ，从而将它插入到客户端运行时中。In the following code example an inserts a into the client runtime by adding it to each in the property. [!code-csharp[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/cs/insertingbehaviors.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Interceptors#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/interceptors/vb/insertingbehaviors.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于选择 的一个 实现。

span.span: Gets or sets an implementation that can be used to select a .

value.span: 选择 的 对象。

span.span: An object that selects a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性在客户端调用特定方法时修改操作的选择。Use the property to modify the selection of an operation when a client invokes a particular method. 默认的算法是将操作方法的 的名称用作关键字，在 集合中查找 。The default algorithm is to use the name of the of the operation method as a key to find the in the collection. 如果找不到匹配的 对象，则调用将被调度到 属性返回的 对象。If no matching object is found, the invocation is dispatched to the object returned from the property.

span.span: Gets the client operation for methods that do not have a corresponding in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ValidateMustUnderstand { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ValidateMustUnderstand : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是由系统还是由应用程序强制执行 SOAP 标头处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the system or the application enforces SOAP header processing.

value.span: 如果由系统执行 SOAP 标头 处理，则为 ，否则为 ，这表示由应用程序执行此处理。

span.span: if the system is to perform SOAP header processing; otherwise , which indicates that the application performs this processing.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来关闭对到达的消息头强制执行验证。Use the property to turn off the enforced validation of arriving message headers. 在正常执行过程中，将消息头与 属性进行比较，来确认是否由服务显式处理到达的消息。In normal execution, message headers are compared against the property to confirm that arriving headers are explicitly handled by the service. 将此属性设置为 `false` 可以禁用此检查。Set this to `false` to disable this checking. 当设置为 `false` 时，应用程序必须检查有 MustUnderstand="true" 标记的标头，如果其中一个或多个标头没有被理解，则返回错误。When set to `false`, the application must check for headers marked with MustUnderstand="true" and return a fault if one or more of them were not understood. 当应用程序应接受任何返回的 SOAP 消息（例如，使用类型化消息或非类型化消息）以及执行自定义标头处理时，这将很有用。This is useful when the application is supposed to accept any returned SOAP messages (for example, when using typed or untyped messages) and perform custom header processing.

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于通过客户端发送消息的传输地址。

span.span: Gets or sets the transport address that is used to send messages through the client.

value.span: ，它是传输的目标地址。

span.span: A that is the destination address for the transport.

value.span: 默认值为客户端的 值。

span.span: The default value is the value of the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当消息的直接目标不是客户端的 时，设置 属性来指定消息的传输地址。Set the property to specify a transport address for messages when the immediate destination of messages is not the client's . 这使您可以指定 SOAP 中介，以及处理客户端的 属性的值不是逻辑名称的情况。This enables you to specify SOAP intermediaries and handle scenarios in which the value of the property of the client is a logical name. 在配置文件中设置的就是这个值。It is this value that the sets from a configuration file.
